'''Stephen Hickman''' ([[9 April]] [[1949]] - [[16 July]] [[2021]]) was an American science-fiction and fantasy artist.<ref>{{Cite web|articleurl=https://www.cbr.com/stephen-hickman-artist-obituary/|articlename=Stephen Hickman, Award-Winning Sci-Fi/Fantasy Painter, Passed Away|website=[https://www.cbr.com/stephen-hickman-artist-obituary/ CBR]|dated=2021|author=Brian Cronin}}</ref> While generally known for book covers, he also created [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]-inspired illustrations, some of them for the [[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game]].
